original: Ekelund, John Albert Daniel, fd. överste, civilingenjör, Norrköping, f. 9/10/6S i Risinge, Östergötl. 1., av kapt. Albert E. o. Emelie Swartz. G. 1. 9’3 m. Siri Rothman, d. 14; 2. 17 m. Marie-Louise Bergsten. Barn: Bo f. 94, g. m. Dagmar Swartling, Sten 98, g. m. Gull Norrman, Lars 03, g. m. Dora DoitaMisioin. ’ — A’vg:ex. f-r. KTH 89. Löjtn. VVK 93, överste där 30, avsk. s. å. Tf. byggn:dhef i Gävle 90-93, ord. dito 93-06, byråing. h. väg- o. vatteribyggn:styr. 06-08, tf. distr:chef i ö. väg- o. vattenbyggn :distr. samma tid, ord. dito 08-30. Vägsakk. h. KB i Östergötl. 1. 25-30, en av stift, av Tekn. fören. i Gävle 96, hed:led. där, en av ’stifit. av Sv. komm:t!eikn. fönen. 02, hed:’led. där, iled. av ’s’tadsfu’l!lm. i Norrköp. 09’-34, v. ordf. 16-19, ordf. i styr. f. Norrköp. komm. aff :verk 10-25, led. av styr. f. Holmens Bruks-& Fabr. A-B 18-44, ordf. 32-38 o. 41-44, ordf. i styr. f. Motala Ströms Regleringsfören. 16-45, i centralstyr. f. Ö’Stergötl.» Ensk. Bank o. i bankens lokalstyr. i Norrköp. 30-41, ordf, i S’tyr. f. N. östergötl. Järnv. A-B, Mel’1. östergötl. Järnv. A-B o-. Trafikförvaltningen östergötl. Smal’Spår. Järnv. 34-47, led. av isakk :komm. f. Stockholms sluss fråga, uppfartsväg. t. Södermalm o. Hammarbyled. 07, led. av komm. f. väg- o. vatten-byggn:styr. omorg. 24, ordf. f. 27 års järnv:ekonomisakk. Skr.: Gefle stads hamn (05), Berätt. rör. järnv. Katrineholm-Köping (32), Berätt. ang. Motala Ströms Reghfören. (41), Berätt. ang. N. östergötl. Järnv. A-B 1924-1944 (44). KN02kl, KV02kl, Norrköp. stads S:t OlofsM, Tekn. fören. i Gävle förtj :M.
translated: Ekelund, John Albert Daniel, former colonel, civil engineer, Norrköping, born 9th of October 1865 in Risinge, Östergötland, son of Captain Albert E. and Emelie Swartz. Married 1st in 1893 to Siri Rothman, who died in 1914; married 2nd in 1917 to Marie-Louise Bergsten. Children: Bo, born in 1894, married to Dagmar Swartling; Sten, born in 1898, married to Gull Norrman; Lars, born in 1903, married to Dora DoitaMisioin. Academic exam from KTH in 1889. Lieutenant in WVK (Swedish engineering troops) in 1893, colonel in 1930, retired the same year. Temporary head of building department in Gävle from 1890-1893, regular from 1893-1906, Bureau engineer in road and water-building authority from 1906-1908, temporary district manager in eastern road and water-building district during the same time, regular from 1908-1930. Road inspector in the Östergötland county from 1925-1930, a member and honorary member of the Technical Association in Gävle in 1896, a member of the Swedish Committee for Standardization in 1902. City council member in Norrköping from 1909-1934, vice chairman from 1916-1919. Chairman of the board for the municipal public works from 1910-1925, member of the board for Holmens Bruks- & Fabriks A-B from 1918-1944, chairman from 1932-1938 and 1941-1944. Chairman of the board for Motala Ströms Regleringsfören from 1916-1945, member of the central board for Östergötland's Private Bank and in the bank's local board in Norrköping from 1930-1941. Chairman of the board for Northmost Östergötland Railway A-B, Mellersta Östergötland Railway A-B, and Traffic Management Östergötland Narrow Gauge Railway from 1934-1947. Member of the ice committee for Stockholm's lock question, and approach road to Södermalm and Hammarbyled 1907, member of the building department committee in Ömorg in 1924, and chairman of the 1927 Railway Economics Commission. Wrote: "Gefle city harbor" (1905), "Report on the Katrineholm-Köping railway" (1932), "Report on the Motala Ströms Reghfören" (1941), "Report on Northmost Östergötland Railway A-B 1924-1944" (1944). Knight of the second class in the Order of the North Star and Royal Order of Vasa, Saint Olaf's Medal from Norrköping city, honorary member of the Technical Association in Gävle.

memberOf.name: Traffic Management Östergötland Narrow Gauge Railway
